Title: Creates the Oak Orchard wastewater project
Summary: Creates the Oak Orchard wastewater project; provides that Onondaga county, within certain requirements and only when a project labor agreement is performed, the county may utilize the alternative delivery method referred to as a design-build contract for a project.
ActClause: AN ACT creating the Oak Orchard wastewater project; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
